page.title: 12A DAY IN THE LIFE,STROUD
page.content: At 7.30 my mum wakes me up I dress and I clear the table then feed Fred and Ebony our rabbits.At 8.30 my sister Amanda and I get our sandwiches clean our teeth comb our hair and go to school.In the playground I play with my friend Tamsin.We have assembly at 9.Mr Dyer our headmaster plays music reads a story we have a hymn and a prayer then go to our classroom.We have lessons like maths and English then playtime.We play skipping or heights.At 12 there is a mad rush for the sinks and lunch bags.We go home at 3 30 and I change and go to play with Toni-Claire at her house or in the playing field.I have tea help with the dishes then watch T V.At 8 30 I have supper and go to bed.I read a book in bed or do a crossword puzzle.
